name: Baldi's Redone Mix Field Trip Plus!
name_original: Baldi's Redone Mix Field Trip Plus!
description:
Hey!

This Is a Decompile of Baldi's Field Trip Demo, But Anyways, this is only sadly for Mac users! So yea, I think there might be a way to turn it into an exe file so it could be for windows but who knows! So yea, Just want to tell you that this is sort of not really changed that much, it was mostly just lighting and assets changing! but yea.

I Hope People Enjoys This Before Baldi's Basics Redone Mix Plus! Comes out! Anyways, Have Fun!
